thread.title: Stay inside? Snow way! How some Torontonians spent the snow day
thread.title_full: Stay inside? Snow way! How some Torontonians spent the snow day

title: Stay inside? Snow way! How some Torontonians spent the snow day
text:
Stay inside? Snow way! How some Torontonians spent the snow day Snowmen, snowboarding, snow angels and snow dogs Posted: Feb 12, 2017 6:42 PM ET Last Updated: Feb 12, 2017 6:42 PM ET As the snow came down Sunday, many Torontonians went outside to enjoy the winter wonderland. (Twitter.ca/@Princess_Mandy) 
It was a snow day for Toronto on Sunday, with 15 centimetres blanketing the city. 
While some stayed cozy indoors, others went outside to play. 
Here's how some Torontonians took advantage of the winter weather. Snowmen and... snow penguins? 
The snow was great for packing and stacking on Sunday. But who needs snowmen when you can make a family of snow penguins?
